          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551949781897,
          "id": "c2adbfb5-6abc-473b-aa62-ab4f4a7a517b",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594620120000,
          "parent_id": "b4d96f8f-08aa-4ac5-b8d9-315e03a771db",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "// create a canvas\nvar canvas=document.createElement(\"canvas\");\nvar ctx=canvas.getContext(\"2d\");\nctx.fillStyle='red';\ndocument.body.appendChild(canvas);\n\n// a variable indicating a circle's X position\nvar circleX=20;\n\n// start animating the circle across the canvas\n// by continuously erasing & redrawing the circle\n// in new positions\nrequestAnimationFrame(animate);\n\nfunction animate(){\n    // update the X position of the circle\n    circleX++;      \n    // redraw the circle in it's new position\n    ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.arc( circleX, 30,15,0,Math.PI*2 );\n    ctx.fill();\n    // request another animate() loop\n    requestAnimationFrame(animate);\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 3
        }
      },
